[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_ACS1.cs] [Function: All Methods] [ACS1 Completeness Invariant] ACS1 implementations should provide complete fee management, but 3 of 4 methods are no-ops - is contract considered incomplete/unsafe for production? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_ACS1.cs] [Function: GetMethodFee()] [Exception Handling] No try-catch around Context.Variables.NativeSymbol access - if Variables is null or throws, can it crash the query? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_ACS1.cs] [Function: GetMethodFeeController()] [Default Authority Pattern] All system contracts initialize controller to Parliament default organization - why does NFT return empty instead? (High)
